mālukyaputtasutta

original: Atha kho āyasmā mālukyaputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami …pe… ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā mālukyaputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā mālukya puttaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami pe ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho āyasmā mālukya puttaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṅkhittena dhammaṁ desetu, yamahaṁ bhagavato dhammaṁ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
analyzed: sādhu me bhante bhagavā saṅkhittena dhammam desetu yam aham bhagavataḥ dhammam sutvā ekaḥ vūpakaṭṭhaḥ appamattaḥ ātāpī pahitattaḥ vihareyyanti

original: “Ettha dāni, mālukyaputta, kiṁ dahare bhikkhū vakkhāma.
analyzed: ettha dāni mālukyaputta kim dahare bhikkhū

original: Yatra hi nāma tvaṁ, bhikkhu, jiṇṇo vuddho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto saṅkhittena ovādaṁ yācasī”ti.
analyzed: yatra hi nāma tva bhikkhu jiṇṇaḥ vuddhaḥ mahallakaḥ addha gataḥ vayaḥ anuppatto saṅkhittena ovādam yācasi iti

original: “Kiñcāpāhaṁ, bhante, jiṇṇo vuddho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto.
analyzed: kiñca apāha bhante jiṇṇaḥ vuddhaḥ mahallakaḥ addha gataḥ vayaḥ anuppatto

original: Desetu me, bhante, bhagavā saṅkhittena dhammaṁ, desetu sugato saṅkhittena dhammaṁ,
analyzed: desetu me bhante bhagavā saṅkhittena dhamma desetu sugataḥ saṅkhittena dhamma

original: appeva nāmāhaṁ bhagavato bhāsitassa atthaṁ ājāneyyaṁ. Appeva nāmāhaṁ bhagavato bhāsitassa dāyādo assan”ti.
analyzed: appa iva nāma aham bhagavataḥ bhāsitassa attham ājāneyya appa iva nāma aham bhagavataḥ bhāsitassa dāyādaḥ assanti
tam kim maññasi mālukyaputta

original: ye te cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā adiṭṭhā adiṭṭhapubbā, na ca passasi, na ca te hoti passeyyanti? Atthi te tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṁ vā”ti?
analyzed: ye te cakkhu viññeyyā rūpā a diṭṭhā a diṭṭha pubbā na ca passasi na ca te hoti passeyyanti atthi te tattha chandaḥ vā rāgaḥ vā pemam vā ati
naḥ heta bhante

original: “Ye te sotaviññeyyā saddā assutā assutapubbā, na ca suṇāsi, na ca te hoti suṇeyyanti? Atthi te tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṁ vā”ti?
analyzed: ye te sota viññeyyā saddāḥ a sutāḥ a suta pubbāḥ na ca suṇāsi na ca te hoti suṇeyyanti atthi te tattha chandaḥ vā rāgaḥ vā pemam vāti
naḥ heta bhante

original: “Ye te ghānaviññeyyā gandhā aghāyitā aghāyitapubbā, na ca ghāyasi, na ca te hoti ghāyeyyanti? Atthi te tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṁ vā”ti?
analyzed: ye te ghāna viññeyyāḥ gandhāḥ a ghāyitāḥ a ghāyita pubbāḥ na ca ghāyasi na ca te hoti ghāyeyyanti atthi te tattha chandaḥ vā rāgaḥ vā pemam vāti
naḥ heta bhante

original: “Ye te jivhāviññeyyā rasā asāyitā asāyitapubbā, na ca sāyasi, na ca te hoti sāyeyyanti? Atthi te tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṁ vā”ti?
analyzed: ye te jivhā viññeyyāḥ rasāḥ a sāyitāḥ a sāyita pubbāḥ na ca sāyasi na ca te hoti sāyeyyanti atthi te tattha chandaḥ vā rāgaḥ vā pemam vāti
naḥ heta bhante

original: “Ye te kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā asamphuṭṭhā asamphuṭṭhapubbā, na ca phusasi, na ca te hoti phuseyyanti? Atthi te tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṁ vā”ti?
analyzed: ye te kāya viññeyyāḥ phoṭṭhabbāḥ a samphuṭṭhāḥ a samphuṭṭha pubbāḥ na ca phusasi na ca te hoti phuseyyanti atthi te tattha chandaḥ vā rāgaḥ vā pemam vā ati
naḥ heta bhante

original: “Ye te manoviññeyyā dhammā aviññātā aviññātapubbā, na ca vijānāsi, na ca te hoti vijāneyyanti? Atthi te tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṁ vā”ti?
analyzed: ye te manaḥ viññeyyāḥ dhammāḥ a viññātāḥ a viññāta pubbāḥ na ca vijānāsi na ca te hoti vijāneyyanti atthi te tattha chandaḥ vā rāgaḥ vā pemam vā ati
naḥ heta bhante

original: “Ettha ca te, mālukyaputta, diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbesu dhammesu diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṁ
analyzed: ettha ca te mālukyaputta diṭṭha suta muta viññātabbesu dhammesu diṭṭhe diṭṭha matta

original: ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āvāsagato mārassa, mārassa vasaṁ gato, paṭimukkassa mārapāso. Baddho so mārabandhanena …pe….
analyzed: ayam vuccati bhikkhave bhikkhu āvāsa gataḥ mārassa mārassa vasam gataḥ paṭimukkassa māra pāsaḥ baddhaḥ saḥ māra bandhanena pe

analyzed: santi bhikkhave manaḥ viññeyyāḥ dhammāḥ iṭṭhāḥ kantāḥ manāpāḥ piya rūpāḥ kāma upasahitāḥ rajanīyāḥ

original: Tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati—

original: ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āvāsagato mārassa, mārassa vasaṁ gato, paṭimukkassa mārapāso.

original: “Nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, gamanena lokassa antaṁ ñāteyyaṁ, daṭṭheyyaṁ, patteyyanti vadāmi.
analyzed: na aha bhikkhave gamanena lokassa antam ñāteyya daṭṭheyya patteyya nti vadāmi

original: Na ca panāhaṁ, bhikkhave, appatvā lokassa antaṁ dukkhassa antakiriyaṁ vadāmī”ti.
analyzed: na ca pana āha bhikkhave a patvā lokassa antam dukkhassa anta kiriyam vadāmi iti

original: Idaṁ vatvā bhagavā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ pāvisi.
analyzed: idam vatvā bhagavā uṭṭhāya āsanā vihāram pāvisi

original: Atha kho tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi:
analyzed: atha kho tesam bhikkhūnam acira pakkantassa bhagavato etat ahosi

original: “idaṁ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṁ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṁ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ paviṭṭho:
analyzed: idam kho no āvuso bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesam uddisitvā vitthārena attham a vibhajitvā uṭṭhāya āsanā vihāram paviṭṭhaḥ

original: ‘“nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, gamanena lokassa antaṁ ñāteyyaṁ, daṭṭheyyaṁ, patteyyan”ti vadāmi.
analyzed: na aha bhikkhave gamanena lokassa antam ñāteyya daṭṭheyya patteyya nti vadāmi

original: Na ca panāhaṁ, bhikkhave, appatvā lokassa antaṁ dukkhassa antakiriyaṁ vadāmī’ti.
analyzed: na ca pana āha bhikkhave a patvā lokassa antam dukkhassa anta kiriyam vadāmi iti

original: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajeyyā”ti?
analyzed: kaḥ nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena attham a vibhattassa vitthārena attham vibhajeyya ati
atha kho tesam bhikkhūnam etat ahosi

original: “ayaṁ kho āyasmā ānando satthu ceva saṁvaṇṇito, sambhāvito ca viññūnaṁ sabrahmacārīnaṁ.
analyzed: ayam kho āyasmai ānando satthu ca iva savaṇṇitaḥ sambhāvitaḥ ca viññūnam sabrahmacārīna

original: Pahoti cāyasmā ānando imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajituṁ.
analyzed: pahoti ca ayasmai ānandaḥ imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena attham avibhattassa vitthārena attham vibhajitu

original: Yannūna mayaṁ yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkameyyāma; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etamatthaṁ paṭipuccheyyāmā”ti.
analyzed: yat nūna mayam yena āyasmai ānandaḥ tena upasaṅkameyyāmaḥ upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam ānandam etam attham paṭipuccheyyāma ati

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā ānandena saddhiṁ sammodiṁsu.
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū yena āyasmā ānandaḥ tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā ānandena saddhim sammodisu

original: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: sammodanīyam katham sāraṇīyam vītisāretvā ekamantam nisīdisu ekamantam nisinnāḥ kho te bhikkhū āyasmantam ānandam etat avocuḥ

original: “Idaṁ kho no, āvuso ānanda, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṁ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṁ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ paviṭṭho:
analyzed: idam kho no āvuso ānanda bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesam uddisitvā vitthārena attham a vibhajitvā uṭṭhāya āsanā vihāram paviṭṭhaḥ

original: ‘nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, gamanena lokassa antaṁ ñāteyyaṁ, daṭṭheyyaṁ, patteyyanti vadāmi.
analyzed: na aha bhikkhave gamanena lokassa antam ñāteyya daṭṭheyya patteyya nti vadāmi

original: Na ca panāhaṁ, bhikkhave, appatvā lokassa antaṁ dukkhassa antakiriyaṁ vadāmī’ti.
analyzed: na ca pana āha bhikkhave a patvā lokassa antam dukkhassa anta kiriyam vadāmi iti

original: Tesaṁ no, āvuso, amhākaṁ acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi:
analyzed: tesam naḥ āvuso amhākam acira pakkantassa bhagavataḥ etat ahosi

original: ‘idaṁ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṁ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṁ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ paviṭṭho—
analyzed: idam kho no āvuso bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesam uddisitvā vitthārena attham a vibhajitvā uṭṭhāya āsanā vihāram paviṭṭhaḥ

original: nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, gamanena lokassa antaṁ ñāteyyaṁ, daṭṭheyyaṁ, patteyyanti vadāmi.
analyzed: na aha bhikkhave gamanena lokassa antam ñāteyya daṭṭheyya patteyya nti vadāmi

original: Na ca panāhaṁ, bhikkhave, appatvā lokassa antaṁ dukkhassa antakiriyaṁ vadāmīti.
analyzed: na ca pana āha bhikkhave a patvā lokassa antam dukkhassa anta kiriyam vadāmi iti

original: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajeyyā’ti?
analyzed: kaḥ nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena attham a vibhattassa vitthārena attham vibhajeyya ati
tesam naḥ āvuso amhākam

original: ‘ayaṁ kho, āvuso, āyasmā ānando satthu ceva saṁvaṇṇito, sambhāvito ca viññūnaṁ sabrahmacārīnaṁ.
analyzed: ayam kho āvuso āyasmai ānando satthu ca iva savaṇṇito sambhāvito ca viññūnam sabrahmacārīna

original: Pahoti cāyasmā ānando imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajituṁ.
analyzed: pahoti ca ayasmai ānandaḥ imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena attham avibhattassa vitthārena attham vibhajitu

original: Yannūna mayaṁ yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkameyyāma; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etamatthaṁ paṭipuccheyyāmā’ti.
analyzed: yat nūna mayam yena āyasmai ānandaḥ tena upasaṅkameyyāmaḥ upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam ānandam etam attham paṭipuccheyyāma ati
vibhajata ayasmai ānanda uti

original: “Seyyathāpi, āvuso, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato
analyzed: seyyathā api āvuso purisaḥ sāratthikaḥ sāra gavesī sāra pariyesanam caramānaḥ mahataḥ

original: rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva, mūlaṁ atikkammeva, khandhaṁ sākhāpalāse
analyzed: rukkhassa tiṭṭhataḥ sāravataḥ atikkamma iva mūlam atikkamma iva khandham sākhāpalāse
sāram pariyesitabbam maññeyya

original: evaṁ sampadamidaṁ āyasmantānaṁ satthari sammukhībhūte taṁ bhagavantaṁ atisitvā amhe etamatthaṁ paṭipucchitabbaṁ maññatha.
analyzed: evam sampadam idam āyasmantānam satthari sammukhībhūte tam bhagavantam atisitvā amhe etam attham paṭipucchitabbam maññatha

original: So hāvuso, bhagavā jānaṁ jānāti, passaṁ passati—
analyzed: saḥ ha āvuso bhagavā jānam jānāti passam passati

original: cakkhubhūto, ñāṇabhūto, dhammabhūto, brahmabhūto, vattā, pavattā, atthassa ninnetā, amatassa dātā, dhammassāmī, tathāgato.
analyzed: cakkhu bhūtaḥ ñāṇa bhūtaḥ dhamma bhūtaḥ brahma bhūtaḥ vattā pavattā atthassa ninnetā amatassa dātā dhamma ssāmī tathāgataḥ

original: So ceva panetassa kālo ahosi yaṁ bhagavantaṁyeva etamatthaṁ paṭipuccheyyātha.
analyzed: saḥ ca iva pana itassa kālaḥ ahosi yam bhagavantayā iva etam attham paṭipuccheyyātha

original: Yathā vo bhagavā byākareyya tathā vo dhāreyyāthā”ti.
analyzed: yathā vaḥ bhagavā byākareyya tathā vaḥ dhāreyyātha ati

original: “Addhāvuso ānanda, bhagavā jānaṁ jānāti, passaṁ passati—
analyzed: addhā avuso ānanda bhagavā jānam jānāti passam passati

original: cakkhubhūto, ñāṇabhūto, dhammabhūto, brahmabhūto, vattā, pavattā, atthassa ninnetā, amatassa dātā, dhammassāmī, tathāgato.
analyzed: cakkhu bhūtaḥ ñāṇa bhūtaḥ dhamma bhūtaḥ brahma bhūtaḥ vattā pavattā atthassa ninnetā amatassa dātā dhamma ssāmī tathāgataḥ

original: So ceva panetassa kālo ahosi yaṁ bhagavantaṁyeva etamatthaṁ paṭipuccheyyāma.
analyzed: saḥ ca iva pana itassa kālaḥ ahosi yam bhagavantayā iva etam attham paṭipuccheyyāma

original: Yathā no bhagavā byākareyya tathā naṁ dhāreyyāma.
analyzed: yathā naḥ bhagavā byākareyya tathā nam dhāreyyāma

original: Api cāyasmā ānando satthu ceva saṁvaṇṇito, sambhāvito ca viññūnaṁ sabrahmacārīnaṁ.
analyzed: api ca ayasmai ānando satthu ca iva savaṇṇitaḥ sambhāvitaḥ ca viññūnam sabrahmacārīna

original: Pahoti cāyasmā ānando imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajituṁ.
analyzed: pahoti ca ayasmai ānandaḥ imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena attham avibhattassa vitthārena attham vibhajitu
vibhajata ayasmai ānandaḥ agarum karitvā ati
tena ha āvuso suṇātha sādhukam manasi karotha bhāsissāmi iti

original: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato ānandassa paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: evam āvuso ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmataḥ ānandassa
āyasmai ānandaḥ etat avoca

original: “Yaṁ kho vo, āvuso, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṁ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṁ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ paviṭṭho:
analyzed: yam kho vaḥ āvuso bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesam uddisitvā vitthārena attham a vibhajitvā uṭṭhāya āsanā vihāram paviṭṭhaḥ

original: ‘nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, gamanena lokassa antaṁ ñāteyyaṁ, daṭṭheyyaṁ, patteyyanti vadāmi.
analyzed: na aha bhikkhave gamanena lokassa antam ñāteyya daṭṭheyya patteyya nti vadāmi

original: Na ca panāhaṁ, bhikkhave, appatvā lokassa antaṁ dukkhassa antakiriyaṁ vadāmī’ti,
analyzed: na ca pana āha bhikkhave a patvā lokassa antam dukkhassa anta kiriyam vadāmi iti

original: imassa khvāhaṁ, āvuso, bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāmi.
analyzed: imassa khvā aha āvuso bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena attham avibhattassa vitthārena attham ājānāmi

original: Yena kho, āvuso, lokasmiṁ lokasaññī hoti lokamānī—
analyzed: yena kho āvuso lokasmim loka saññī hoti loka mānī

original: Atha kho mayaṁ, bhante, yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkamimha; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etamatthaṁ paṭipucchimha.

original: ‘dhammikā kho asurā, adhammikā devā, tattheva dānāhaṁ asurapuraṁ gamissāmī’ti.
analyzed: dhammikā kho asurāḥ adhammikāḥ devāḥ tattha iva dāna aham asura puram gamissāmi iti

original: atha kaṇṭhapañcamehi bandhanehi baddhaṁ attānaṁ samanupassati, dibbehi ca pañcahi kāmaguṇehi parihāyati.
analyzed: atha kaṇṭha pañcamehi bandhanehi baddham attānam samanupassati dibbehi ca pañcahi kāmaguṇehi parihāyati
evam sukhumam kho bhikkhave vepa citti bandhana
sukhumataram māra bandhana

original: Maññamāno kho, bhikkhave, baddho mārassa, amaññamāno mutto pāpimato.
analyzed: maññamānaḥ kho bhikkhave baddhaḥ mārassa a maññamānaḥ muttaḥ pāpimataḥ
asmi iti bhikkhave maññitam eta ayam aham asmi iti maññitam eta bhavissanti maññitam eta
na bhavissanti maññitam eta rūpī bhavissanti maññitam eta arūpī bhavissanti
maññitam eta saññī bhavissanti maññitam eta asaññī bhavissanti maññitam eta
na ivasaññī na asaññī bhavissanti

original: Maññitaṁ, bhikkhave, rogo, maññitaṁ gaṇḍo, maññitaṁ sallaṁ.
analyzed: maññita bhikkhave rogaḥ maññitam gaṇḍaḥ maññitam salla
tasmāt iha bhikkhave a maññamānena cetasā viharissāma ati
evam hi vaḥ bhikkhave sikkhitabba
asmi iti bhikkhave iñjitam eta ayam aham asmi iti iñjitam eta bhavissanti iñjitam eta
na bhavissanti iñjitam eta rūpī bhavissanti iñjitam eta arūpī bhavissanti
iñjitam eta saññī bhavissanti iñjitam eta asaññī bhavissanti iñjitam eta nevasaññī na asaññī
bhavissanti

original: Iñjitaṁ, bhikkhave, rogo, iñjitaṁ gaṇḍo, iñjitaṁ sallaṁ.
analyzed: iñjita bhikkhave rogaḥ iñjitam gaṇḍo iñjitam salla
tasmāt iha bhikkhave an iñjamānena cetasā viharissāma ati
evam hi vaḥ bhikkhave sikkhitabba
asmi iti bhikkhave phanditam eta ayam aham asmi iti phanditam eta bhavissanti
pe na bhavissanti rūpī bhavissanti arūpī bhavissanti saññī bhavissanti
asaññī bhavissanti na ivasaññī na asaññī bhavissanti phanditam eta

original: Phanditaṁ, bhikkhave, rogo, phanditaṁ gaṇḍo, phanditaṁ sallaṁ.
analyzed: phandita bhikkhave rogo phanditam gaṇḍo phanditam salla
tasmāt iha bhikkhave a phandamānena cetasā viharissāma ati
evam hi vaḥ bhikkhave sikkhitabba
asmi iti bhikkhave papañcitam eta ayam aham asmi iti papañcitam eta bhavissanti
pe na bhavissanti rūpī bhavissanti arūpī bhavissanti saññī bhavissanti
asaññī bhavissanti na ivasaññī na asaññī bhavissanti

original: Papañcitaṁ, bhikkhave, rogo, papañcitaṁ gaṇḍo, papañcitaṁ sallaṁ.
analyzed: papañcita bhikkhave rogo papañcitam gaṇḍo papañcitam salla
tasmāt iha bhikkhave nippapañcena cetasā viharissāma ati
evam hi vaḥ bhikkhave sikkhitabba
asmi iti bhikkhave māna gatam eta ayam aham asmi iti māna gatam eta bhavissanti
māna gatam eta na bhavissanti māna gatam eta rūpī bhavissanti māna gatam eta
arūpī bhavissanti māna gatam eta saññī bhavissanti māna gatam eta asaññī bhavissanti
māna gatam eta na ivasaññī na asaññī bhavissanti māna gatam eta

original: Mānagataṁ, bhikkhave, rogo, mānagataṁ gaṇḍo, mānagataṁ sallaṁ.
analyzed: māna gata bhikkhave rogaḥ māna gatam gaṇḍaḥ māna gatam salla
tasmāt iha bhikkhave nihata mānena cetasā viharissāma ati
evam hi vaḥ bhikkhave sikkhitabbanti
ekādasama
āsīvisa vaggo catuttho
tassa uddāna
āsīvisaḥ rathaḥ kummo
dve dāru khandhā avassutaḥ
dukkha dhammā kisukā vīṇā
chappāṇā yavakalāpī iti
saḷāyatana vagge catuttha paṇṇāsakaḥ samatto
tassa vagguddāna
nandi kkhayo saṭṭhi nayo
samuddaḥ uragena ca
catu paṇṇāsakāḥ ete
nipātesu pakāsitā ati
saṅgāyatana sayuttam
